Title: Transparency enhancing technologies to make security protocols work for humans (transcript of discussion)
Abstract: © Springer Nature Switzerland AG 2020.If you’ve heard some of my talks before then most of the time I’ve been banging on about Chip & PIN. I’m not, in this talk – this is about another dispute, another court case, and this is Bates and Others vs. Post Office Ltd. And in my first five minutes I’m hoping to tell you why this is interesting.
